meanings.definition: The act of gaining access to something again.
meanings.sent1: After losing my key, the reaccession to my house was a relief.
meanings.sent2: The reaccession to the online platform was seamless after resetting my password.
meanings.sent3: The reaccession to the library after returning the overdue books felt like a victory.
meanings.sent4: Her reaccession to the group chat brought back a sense of belonging.
meanings.sent5: The reaccession to the treasure chest revealed long-forgotten jewels.

meanings.definition: The process of rejoining an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: His reaccession to the club was celebrated by all members.
meanings.sent2: The reaccession to the team required a formal application process.
meanings.sent3: The reaccession to the book club meant more reading nights ahead.
meanings.sent4: Her reaccession to the band brought back memories of their first performance.
meanings.sent5: The reaccession to the puzzle club sparked her love for problem-solving once again.
